text:
The main channel of Tiruchi station of All India Radio will and its FM Rainbow channel will present a live broadcast of the ‘mahamaham’ celebrations at Kumbakonam from 12.05 p.m. to 1 p.m. on Monday (February 22).

The programme will be on air through all the radio stations of All India Radio across Tamil Nadu and Puducherry, an official release added.
title: AIR broadcast
